title: What is nomadic, and what are some examples? - Quora

response.answer_text: A nomad is someone who lives by traveling from place to place. And nomadic lifestyle means the same. That the person concerned moves from place to place without having a fixed residence. Nomadic people tend to keep small jobs at the places that they currently live in, part time or temp jobs, stay their for some time and move. It all depends on the person. To give you a better understanding of such a lifestyle here's a link: The One Who The Traded Big City Life For The Nomad Life | The Remote Life Community. I hope this helps. :)
